item.title: Goodbye, BCN eMotorsport
item.description:
After two incredible years with BCN eMotorsport, it’s time to say goodbye. From my first year and a half working on developing our inverter to this past year as a Team Leader, it has been an unforgettable journey.

Leading the team and managing the organizational side was both a challenge and a privilege. It taught me invaluable lessons about responsibility—what it truly means to be accountable for the team’s actions, owning both the successes and the (many) failures.
